CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, '0'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'I'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, '3'),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'G')),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Channel')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Independent Surveyor'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'E'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'INSURANCE'),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'I')),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'REINSURANCE'),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'I')),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'BROKER'),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'I')),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Claim Surveyor'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'E'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Claim Investigator'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'E'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Loss Adjuster'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'E'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Claim Consultant'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'E'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, '3rd Party Claim Admin'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'E'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Repairer Shop'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'E'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Part Supplier'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'E'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct')), AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Salvage Buyer'),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'G')),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct'))
),'1', IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, '0'),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'I')),ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Direct')), '2', IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, '1'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'E'),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Referral'))), '3', IF ( AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, '4'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'E'),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Referral'))), '4', IF ( AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, '2'),ISPICKVAL(Account_Segment__c, 'E'),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account_Pipeline_Status__c, 'Referral'))), '5','0' ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Group Account Matrix
